attributes.action: BAN the use of non sustainable palm oil in all produce
attributes.additional_details:
Orangutan numbers will decline by 30% by 2020, if we do not act now.   Do the maths, if they decline by 30% in the next 2 years, then they will be extinct by 2025.

How can we have done this to them, and when we have a final chance to help right our wrongs, just do NOTHING!!!???
attributes.background: the use of palm oil is destroying rain forest and the natural habitat of species such as the Orangutan who will be extinct by 2025!!!!
